Reviews.Title: Totally satisfied
Reviews.Author: Gerry Landreth
Reviews.Content: This is a great workhorse machine. I work with large files, including heavy graphics, and this baby has handled everything extremely well. You can find lighter laptops in sexier colors, but this computer will pretty much do whatever you need to do and won't break the bank.

Reviews.Title: Very please with the Product.  I would have no Issues with purchasing this product again.
Reviews.Author: Graham Moore
Reviews.Content: Very please with the Product.  I would have not issue purchasing this product in the future for myself or a friend.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5-4200M Processor 2.5GHz
Microsoft Windows 7 Professional 64-bit, 15.6" LED-backlit HD Anti-glare Display
8GB DDR3-1600 SDRAM, 750GB 7,200RPM Hard Drive
AMD Radeon HD 8750M, Wireless Bluetooth 4.0
DVDRW Drive, 10/100/1000 Network, 802.11b/g/n
ProductInfo.Name: HP ProBook 450 G1 15.6" Laptop,i5-4200M, Windows 7 Pro, 8GB RAM, 750GB 5,400RPM HD, AMD Radeon HD 8750M, 15.6" LED-backlit HD Anti-Glare Display
